long_description: No need to leave one of your electronic devices at home. The roomy, 26-liter Osprey Cyber daypack features separate padded sleeves for both a tablet and a laptop. Zippered back compartment lets you quickly access the sleeve for a 15 in. laptop, as well as a smaller, zippered sleeve for a tablet. Magazine/document sleeves; organizer pocket keeps small items secure and handy. Top grab handle makes it easy to pick up the pack and go. Soft, comfortable shoulder straps; adjustable sternum strap with safety whistle; ventilated back panel. Textured fabric and clean lines give the Osprey Cyber daypack a retro feel with a modern tough.
short_description: No need to leave one of your electronic devices at home. The roomy, 26-liter Osprey Cyber daypack features separate padded sleeves for both a tablet and a laptop.
